messages.chat: Say something in chat! Don't be shy
Cannibals don't eat clowns because they taste funny.
If all the world's a stage, where does the audience sit?
If one synchronized swimmer drowns, do the others drown too? Creepy.
Why did Yankee Doodle name the feather in his hat Macaroni? Answer in chat.
If electricity comes from electrons, does morality comes from morons?
Why does someone believe you when you say there are four billion stars, but check when you say the paint is wet?
What if Batman gets bitten by a vampire?
Can we spell creativity however we want?
What was the greatest thing BEFORE sliced bread?
Why isn't chocolate considered a vegetable, if chocolate comes from cocoa beans, and all beans are a vegetable?
Do pyromaniacs wear blazers? Answer in chat.
Blurt out a line from a favorite song.
What is the air-speed velocity of an unladen swallow?
Eat a live toad the first thing in the morning and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.
Nothing is as simple as we hope it will be. - Jim Horning
An inconvenience is an adventure wrongly considered. G. K. Chesterton
As pretty as an Airport.
Automatic simply means that you cannot repair it yourself.
A Smith & Wesson always beats four aces.
A bird in hand is safer than one overhead.
A bird in the hand is worth about three Kleenex.
A closed mouth says nothing wrong; a closed mind does nothing right.
A computer makes as many mistakes in one second as three men working for thirty years straight.
A dog is a dog except when he is facing you. Then he is Mr. Dog.
A fellow who is always declaring that he is no fool usually harbors suspicions to the contrary.
A fool and his money are some party.
A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.
A major failure will not occur until after this game has passed final exhaustive teting.
A minecrafter builds castles in the air. A psychotic lives in castles in the air. And a psychiatrist is the guy who collects the rent.
Lovely weather we are having within the game, don't you think?
A synonym is a word you use when you can't spell the other one.
Minecraft rivalries are so intense because the stakes are so small.
All things are possible. Except skiing through a revolving door.
All turtle thoughts are of turtle.
All warranties expire upon payment of invoice.
Almost everything in life is easier to get into than out of.
Always address your elders with respect; they could leave you a fortune.
Forgive your enemies - nothing else annoys them as much.
An elephant is a mouse built to government specifications.
An expert is one who knows more and more about less and less until he knows absolutely everything about nothing.
Be nice to your team. An unhappy crew makes for a dangerous voyage.
Any given computer program, when running, is obsolete.
Bad weather forecasts are more often right than good ones.
Black holes are outa sight!
Blessed are the censors, for they shall inhibit the earth. (Cool chat filter, huh?)
Computers are unreliable, but humans are even more unreliable.
Confidence is the feeling you had before you knew better.
Did you know that if you maintain a cholesterol-free diet, your body makes its own cholesterol?
Don't wear earmuffs in a bed of rattlesnakes.
Every calling is great when greatly pursued.
Every family tree has some sap.
Everyone has a scheme for getting rich that will not work.
Everything comes to he who waits. You just need infinite patience.
Show someone your gratitude today.
We are really glad you are playing this game today.
Get up and stretch once in awhile.
Time to stop playing and get outside?
Say something nice to another player.
How much does it cost to ride a PCI bus? 2 Bits.
Designed with you in mind by people who have in mind what you should have in mind.
Secrecy is the beginning of tyranny.
If the only tool you have is a hammer, all problems will look like nails
Don't try to have the last word. You might get it.
Never throw an egg at an electric fan.
Reading is thinking with someone else's head instead of one's own.
Disclose classified information only when a NEED TO KNOW exists.
Acquaintance: a person whom we know well enough to borrow from, but not well enough to lend to.
To laugh at men of sense is the privilege of fools.
Let a fool hold his tongue and he will pass for a sage.
What kind of sound does a sub-atomic duck make? Quark!!
You can pay for a capacitor with cash but it is better to charge it.
Today is a good day to count your blessings
Let not the sands of time get in your lunch.
Never play leap frog with a unicorn.
He who laughs, lasts
Make trades with other players
The game is more fun when you are on a team
An asylum for the sane would be empty.
Call a friend IRL today.
May you live all the days of your life.
Speak well of your friends
Did you hear the one about the athelete who was so proud of his gold medal that he had it bronzed?
Work expands to fill the time available for its completion.
The junk you have will expand to fill the available space.
THE PETER PRINCIPLE: In every hierarchy, each employee tends to rise to his level of incompetence.
CHEOPS' LAW: Nothing ever gets built on schedule or within budget.
MURPHY'S LAW: If something can go wrong, it will.
WEILER'S LAW: Nothing is impossible for the man who does not have to do it himself.
When all else fails, read the instructions.
We are thinking of rewriting this in FORTRAN (Ask your parents what that is)
Government intervention in the free market always leads to a lower national standard of living.
It is much harder to find a friend than to keep one.
Established technology tends to persist in spite of new technology.
Adding manpower to a late software project makes it later.
People occasionally stumble over the truth but most of the time pick themselves up and continue on as if nothing had happened.
Cole's Law: Thinly sliced cabbage.
There ain't no such thing as a free lunch.
The other line moves faster.
Whenever possible blame the hardware.
Every person has a scheme that will not work.
In order to get a loan you must first prove you don't need it.
Save 10 percent of your income.
Friends may come and go, but enemies accumulate.
Law of Selective Gravity (The Buttered Side Down Law) An object will fall so as to do the most damage.
You cannot successfully determine beforehand which side of the bread to butter.
Fancy gizmos seldom work.
Pereto's principle: 80 percent of the production comes from 20 percent of the producers
you can't tell how deep a puddle is until you step into it.
Nothing is as easy as it looks.
Everything takes longer than you think.
It is impossible to make anything foolproof because fools are so ingenious.
A bird in the hand is safer than one overhead.
Variables won't, constants aren't.
Expenditures rise to meet income.
Live within your means. (VIP is very affordable!)
Everyone has good qualities
It works better if you plug it in.
A man with one watch knows what time it is; a man with two watches is never sure.
The intensity of movie publicity is in inverse ratio to the quality of the movie.
There is no direct relationship between the quality of an educational program and its cost.
If you want a track team to win the high jump you find one person who can jump seven feet, not seven people who can jump one foot.
If you cannot convince them, confuse them.
The easiest way of making money is to stop losing it.
Industry always moves in to fill an economic vacuum.
The sooner and in more detail you announce bad news, the better.
He who hesitates is lost.
When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
It is never too late to learn.
You can't teach an old dog new tricks. It's illegal.
Act in haste, repent at leisure. (Look before you leap.)
Out of sight, out of mind.
Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
Many hands make light work.
Actions speak louder than words.
Never change horses in mid-stream.
Silence is golden. (So why do we keep putting out these messages?)
The squeaky wheel gets the grease.
Practice makes perfect.
All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
It's much easier to ride a horse the way he is going.
Never try to outstubborn a cat
Please engage brain before setting mouth into motion.
One man's bug is another man's feature
"MEOW"...SPLAT..."RUFF"...SPLAT...(Raining cats & dogs)
WHO CARES where Carmen Sandiego is?
(A)bort, (R)etry, (F)ail, (G)rab_Hammer
A field upgrade, HAL. We're going to make you IBM compatible.
A nudist has no reason to fear a pickpocket.
Smile. It makes people wonder what you're up to.
copy *.txt > brain
Cross river THEN insult alligator.
Despite the high cost of living, it remains popular.
Did you expect mere proof to sway my opinion
Do radioactive cats have eighteen half-lives?
Do witches use Spell-checkers?
Pirate software comes with a treasure map.
Don't lend people money. It causes amnesia.
Don't look now, but your file is unzipped.
Don't worry the next message will be better!

Everyone is gifted. Some just open their packages sooner.
Help stamp out, eliminate, and abolish redundancy!
Hire teenagers while they still know everything.

I haven't lost my mind, it's backed up on disk
I was so much older then, I'm younger than that now

If at first you don't succeed, call it Beta

Join in on chats, they are fun
Junk - stuff we throw away. Stuff - junk we keep.
Luxuriantly hand-crafted from only the finest ASCII.

No Credit, Bad Credit? No Problem. No Money? Problem.
Thank-you for helping us grow the network.
Speak kindly to one another.
Programmers don't get sniffles, they get a CODE.
Proofread carefully to see if you any words out!
Public Restroom-The only place a flush beats a full house
Purranoia: the fear one's cats are up to something.
Santa's elves are just a bunch of subordinate Clauses.
Some days you're the windshield, some days the bug.

The wise open their minds, but a fool opens his mouth.
To err is human, to forgive is against my policy
To err is human. To moo is bovine.
We'll burn that bridge when we come to it.
We're lost but we're making good time.

You used to be indecisive. Now you're not sure.
You will become rich and famous unless you don't.
A wise son brings joy to his father.
The wise in heart accept commands.
Whoever takes crooked paths will be found out.
Love covers over all wrongs.
With humility comes wisdom.
Hopes placed in mortals die with them.
A gossip betrays a confidence, but a trustworthy person keeps a secret.
You will never be younger then you are today.
